alert.note: Alert for Benton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:18AM CDT until July 19 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND NORTHEASTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paris Landing State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Puryear, Big Sandy, Haigler Ridge, Sunnyside, Conyersville, Old Springville, Buchanan, India and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
